definition[0]: an amount of money left with a person or organization to pay for damage that might be done or for some other thing that might cost them money
definition[1]: money paid by someone who has a contract with someone else, to make certain that they do what the contract says they must do
definition[2]: money paid by someone who is about to buy something that is expensive and complicated to buy, for example a house, to prove that they intend to complete the deal
